# Other resources

Here you can find a selection of other resources for learning stastistics and programming. 

## Statistics 

### YouTube channels
- [StatQuest with Josh Starmer](https://www.youtube.com/@statquest)
- [Very Normal](https://www.youtube.com/@very-normal)
- [Zedstastitics](https://www.youtube.com/@zedstatistics)

### E-books

- [ANOVA and Mixed Models](https://people.math.ethz.ch/~meier/teaching/anova/)
